item.description:
The Annual NH Sheep and Wool Festival is at the Hopkinton Fair Grounds.

From I-93: Take I-89 in Concord. Get off at Exit 7, turn right on Rte. 103, and right on Kearsarge Ave./Warner Rd.

For more info on events and vendors go to their website http://www.yankeeshep...

For those of us going, and who are up for it, let's meet for lunch at 12:30pm, at the area where the food vendors are and there is the curved brick wall and the picnic tables. If this is confusing, email me and I'll send you my cell so I can give you better directions when I get there and can see the booths nearby
item.name: NH Sheep and Wool Festival
